subject: Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Gary Nova’s two scoring passes to Leonte Carroo in the final 10 minutes capped a 17-point rally for the Scarlet Knights, who edged the Razorbacks, 28-24.
snippet: Gary Nova’s two scoring passes to Leonte Carroo in the final 10 minutes capped a 17-point rally for the Scarlet Knights, who edged the Razorbacks, 28-24.
